title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing when the window is resized vertically. All tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash during this operation. The reason for this behavior is unknown.
OB: When running the Control Example, resize the window in the vertical direction only. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should be no excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe the tabs in the TabFolder and the Frames to check for excessive flashing.
